text: Yep. We're on the same page.
Seriously, you lost enough weight to erase me from existence with a few pounds to spare. That's an incredible amount of change.  And from just switching up food and exercise a bit!

Exactly why OP listened to their body and told the higher up that it was not safe.   Unfortunately, OP didn't go the full 9 yards and refuse to perform rigorous work in the heat, knowing that it was already too much to handle safely.
